name: SitronLabs_DACx0501_Arduino_Library
description: Arduino library for Texas Instruments DACx0501 series of DACs with SPI and I2C support. This library provides an easy-to-use interface for the Texas Instruments DACx0501 series of digital-to-analog converters. It supports both SPI and I2C communication interfaces and includes features like multiple output channels (12-bit DAC60501, 14-bit DAC70501, 16-bit DAC80501), configurable gain, power management, and broadcast mode.
keywords: sitron labs,sitron,labs,arduino,library,spi,dac,digital to analog,digital to analog converter,dac5311,dac6311,dac7311,dac8311,dac8411,buffered,rail to rail
